column4: does anybody know why i wouldnt be able to install 9.10 after installing windows 7 and trying a clean install of ubuntu?
i have no clue. it doesnt get past letting me select whether to install or run live. either one gives me a black screen forever
are you burn the CD correctly?
this might help : http://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Xorg, it has quite nice info
